component.name: AppInfoDialog
component.script:
function init() m.top.title = "Welcome to Running Stream - Your Channel" m.top.message = ["Running Stream is a free web application that allows you to build the streaming channel you want to see. Get started by creating an account at https://runningstream.cc, then putting in the addresses of your content. Once you've setup your account there, login here!"] m.top.buttons = ["Login", "Cancel"]
m.top.observeFieldScoped("buttonSelected", "dismissDialog") m.top.observeFieldScoped("wasClosed", "wasClosedChanged") end function
sub wasClosedChanged() if m.top.selected = "unset" m.top.selected = "Cancel" m.top.close = true end if end sub
sub dismissDialog() m.top.selected = m.top.buttons[m.top.buttonSelected] m.top.close = true end sub
